archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Architecture is perceived to have no value
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Architecture design is hugely misunderstood. People do not know enough about it to realise they know nothing about it. Theres a general perception that architecture modelling is about drawing boxes, and architecture design is seen as a documentation exercise rather than a process and methodology that should be used to manage complexity and strengthen the business.
Rather than driving decision making it is seen as an annoying exercise that has no importance, beyond the fact everyone asks for it.
